Package books_catalogue

Class Genre

java.lang.Object
books_catalogue.Genre
public class Genre extends Object
Helper Genre class for grouping together all genre related data.

    • readBinaryFile

      public void readBinaryFile() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Reads binary file and saves the array of Book objects
      Throws:
      IOException - if binary file doesn't exist or can't be read
      ClassNotFoundException - if binary file contains objects of an unknown class
